728907f-a.title: Richmond: Hamilton Avenue - Stuyvesant Place
728907f-a.text:
Hamilton Avenue (right), west from Stuyvesant 'lace.
In the center background is Curtis igh 5chool, at St. Marks
Place; on the right is the astleton Park Apartments. The
house in the foreground is the Stursbepg house, at the S. V.
corner of ' amilton Avenue and Stuyvesant -lace.
August 2, 1928
P. L. Sperr
